data.scheme_name: Market Development Assistance to MSMEs - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides reimbursement of 75% for participation in exhibition.
data.eligibility: All units of manufacturing sector participating in Exhibitions/Trade fairs are eligible under the scheme.
data.conditions:
1. The Enterprise that has received assistance under this scheme will not be entitled to avail benefit of any other state Government Scheme for the same component/purpose, unless specifically specified under that scheme. 
  2. Enterprise will be entitled for maximum five times of participation in State level, National level and International level inside India in total. 
  3. MSME unit must apply an IFP Portal to DIC within 6 months from the last date of exhibition/trade fair in which it has participated.
data.beneficiaries: All units of manufacturing sector participating in Exhibitions/Trade fairs are eligible under the scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. The Enterprise that has received assistance under this scheme will not be entitled to avail benefit of any other state Government Scheme for the same component/purpose, unless specifically specified under that scheme. 
  2. Enterprise will be entitled for maximum five times of participation in State level, National level and International level inside India in total. 
  3. MSME unit must apply an IFP Portal to DIC within 6 months from the last date of exhibition/trade fair in which it has participated.
data.context:
• Looking at the opportunity of the Machinery Manufacturing Industries in Gujarat for both Domestic and International market, the Industrial Policy 2020 provides extending support to promote the manufacturing sector with an integrated approach for the overall development of the State. 
  • This integrated approach is designed to promote the manufacturing sector for the overall development of the State.
data.objective:
• The policy aims to enhance the competitiveness of MSMEs and strengthen them within the state, recognizing their significant contribution to the economy and employment generation. 
  • The policy also includes proactive support for the development of MSMEs through technological up - gradation, quality product, and Market Development Initiatives.
data.description:
1. Scheme provides reimbursement for exhibition : State Level exhibition - assistance @75% of rent paid or maximum upto Rs 0.5 lakhs. 
  2. Expenditure incurred for products and display would be limited to Rs.0.10 lakhs. 
  3. National Level exhibition - assistance @75% of rent paid or maximum upto Rs 1 lakhs. 
  4. International Level exhibition (Inside India) - assistance @75% of rent paid or Rs.2 lakhs. Expenditure incurred for products and display would be limited to Rs.0.20 lakhs. 
  5. International Level exhibition (outside India) - assistance @60% of rent paid or Rs.5 lakhs. Expenditure incurred for products and display would be limited to Rs.0.50 lakhs.
data.how_to_apply:
The applicant can apply through District Industries Centre (DIC) below is the link:
https://ifp.gujarat.gov.in/DIGIGOV/
data.funding_mechanism: The Applicant will get the Reimbursement after approval of application by the concerned authority.
data.checklist_info_a:
Application Form
Copy of valid UAM / Udyam Registration
Details of Assistance Obtained from GoI
Details of Assistance Obtained from GoG
Following Details of Exhibition / Fair,
Name / Address of Organizer
Duration of the exhibition
Broacher of Exhibition.
Details of Entrepreneur With Address
Details of Expenditure of stall rent (C.A. Certified)
Copy of Rent Receipt
Proof of being a State level / National level /International level Exhibition (Inside India / Outside India) / Fair,Photographs of Exhibition with date, Photographs of Main Entrance of the exhibition
Original copy of catalogue / Brochure / printing material prepared for Exhibition/trade fair
Detail of earlier participation , if any No. of Times Benefit of MDA Scheme
Copy of VISA of person who attended the exhibition and air ticket and boarding pass (if international travel)
In the Case of International Exhibition must be Attached Copy of Passport Stamping of Immigration by that Country
Copy of Registration certificate of membership with EPC,ITPO,FIEO etc.
Affidavit before Notary, as per Annexure-1i.e. Self Declaration, Copy of Bill / Invoice of Printing Charges of literature / Display Material
C.A. Certified Detailed statement of Expenditure of participating Trade Fair / Exhibition Outside India, as per Format Specified. Annexure-2 i.e. Performa Expenditure Statement
All the Documents submitted to DIC / Head Office should be signed by authorized signator
data.checklist_info_d:
Address : Office of The Industries Commissionerate Block No. 1, 2nd Floor, Udyog Bhavan, Gandhinagar 382 010. Gujarat. INDIA
Ph. : 23252683/23252617 
Email ID : iccord@gujarat.gov.in
